page.title: 11PINHOE:OTHER SCHOOLS.
page.content: {Ellen Tinkham School }is where{ {mentally handicapped children}go.The school is specially equipped with things which can help them.The ages of the children are 5 to 16.There are about 86 children.The 10 classes are very small.The school was a house at one time. {St.Helena School }was 49 years old and closed on 17th May 1985.The school was run by an elderly lady who also did the teaching.The school was a big house.The bottom of the house was divided into three parts,the hall (cloak room),kitchen (where school dinners were cooked) and the school room which was into two, one part for the under sevens the other part for the over sevens.The ages were for boys 4 to 8 and for girls 4 to 11 years.
